headline: 3 Reasons We’re Fans of Lululemon (LULU)
summary: Over the past six months, Lululemon’s stock price fell to $201.69. Shareholders have lost 9.6% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 10%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: A Look At Lululemon Athletica (LULU) Valuation After Raised Fourth Quarter Earnings Guidance
summary: lululemon athletica (LULU) has caught investor attention after the company said it now expects fourth quarter fiscal 2025 revenue of US$3.5b to US$3.585b and diluted EPS toward the high end of prior guidance. See our latest analysis for lululemon athletica. The raised guidance comes after a mixed run in the stock, with a 90 day share price return of 11.29% contrasting with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 45.98%. This suggests that recent momentum has improved even as longer term...
